Articles.Content:
Hello,

I'm a REALLY huge fan of halo and i am going to probably be starting to make halo crafts and videos in KSP.

Some of the halo crafts such as the forward unto dawn or the infinity will probably either need space construction or hyper edit because a behemoth like that would be hard to get into space hehe, i do apologize for that

Also i might start making a series of videos from ksp, it is like the world war k except with halo type weaponry and such aswell as like ships and just really how i'll operate

If you like halo and odst (or all lol) like me, you'll love it if i upload a orbital drop pod craft so keep your eyes open if interested.

Thanks for reading, happy spacing!
Welcome to the forums! You've got one halo fan here now! I would love to see what you come up with.
Welcome hope you stay here as long as you can and don't be shy to ask or suggest in Kerbal Space Program Forum
